richTextBody.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Last updated: January 18th, 2023","marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Brief Overview","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Blankets for T.O. Tote Bag Competition","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" aims to raise awareness for the daily challenges faced by the homeless community during the winter, by having competitors strive to create the most effective tote bag care package. Each participating group, individual, or organization crafts their own creative idea of a tote bag by hand-picking items to include in the package, based on their assessment of the needs of homeless individuals in Toronto. Based on their written or video submission, their tote bag is judged, and the submission featuring the most creative and thoughtful care package will win a prize! ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Eligibility","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The competition is open to all. A participant can be a single individual or group of individuals. A participant may also choose to enter as representatives of an organization (e.g. company, school, charity, student association or place of worship), provided that you have appropriate approval from the organization or group that you are representing.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://forms.gle/RTfGdRFK4GJ3vEWp7"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Those interested in participating must register via this Google Form by February 10th, 2023.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Competition Rules ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"To compete in the Tote Bag Competition, each participant must complete the following by the indicated deadlines.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Register for the competition","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://forms.gle/RTfGdRFK4GJ3vEWp7"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Register by completing this Google form by February 10th, 2023.","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Create a suitable care package that would help a homeless individual if donated to them. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The care package should contain at least 5 items","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" Items packaged together into a single kit can be considered as one item.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Submit a written piece or short video describing your completed care package to our judges. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The written piece or video must be submitted by February 20th, 2023.","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" We will give more details on how to send your submission closer to the deadline.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Videos must be shorter than 2 minutes. Written pieces must be shorter than 500 words.","marks":[{"type":"underline"},{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/reel/CNOc75KBswI/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Here is an example of what we are looking for","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":". Exceeding the limit will lose you points, so keep your submission short and sweet.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Your video or written piece must include the following information:","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"An introduction of you or your group, and why you were motivated to participate in the competition.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"A brief description of all items selected for your care package and why those items were chosen.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Read the \"Judging Criteria\" section below for more information.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-4","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Attend our Tote Bag Competition event at the University of Toronto Scarborough (UTSC) on February 24th, 2023.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"unordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Bring your Tote Bag that you made, so that Blankets for T.O. can help distribute them.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The winner will be announced during this event. To be eligible to win the competition, the participating individual or group must be physically present at this event.","marks":[{"type":"underline"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"There will be food, as well as opportunities to mix & mingle with other participants.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The event will be open to the general public, including any members of the media.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Judging Criteria","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We want groups to express their creativity and thoughtfulness through their selection of items. Each entry is scored on four categories, each with 5 attainable points, and the category scores are summed to calculate a total score out of 20.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"ordered-list","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Item Quality ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points): Are the items of high durability? How long do they last? Are they protective against the elements? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Creativity ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points)","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":": ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Has there been creative thought put into what items to include? Was there an item included that was not seen in other packages? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Usefulness","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" (0-5 points): Will the chosen items be helpful to homeless individuals? Do the items alleviate a key necessity or address an important issue faced by the homeless community? ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"list-item","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Presentation ","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"(0-5 points): What is the overall quality of the video? Are all items arranged and shown clearly?  ","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We encourage participating groups to do some research into homeless issues and the conditions faced by homeless individuals in their communities, so that they can guide their item choices with specific ideas and use cases in mind.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Prize","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The highest-scoring submission will win a $100 gift card, or item equivalent in value.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Questions and Contact Info","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Feel free to reach out to Blankets for T.O. via email or social media for any questions and inquiries about the Tote Bag Competition. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Find our contact email and social media details here","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

childMarkdownRemark.html: The 2022-2023 Tote Bag Competition challenges participants to create the most effective care packages for donation to the homeless.
childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: The 2022-2023 Tote Bag Competition challenges participants to create the most effective care packages for donation to the homeless.
